headline: Management Information Analyst at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
High energy business/financial analyst with solid analytical and interpersonal skills.  Extensive expertise in SAP R/3 development for large semiconductor foundry and packaging installations.  Passionate about process re-engineering.  A collaborative self-starter, fast learner, and creative problem-solver.  Known for cost containment through financial analysis best practices.  Synthesizes visual arts creativity with business acumen for original, high quality customized solutions.

Specialties: Business Analysis
Financial Analysis
Budget Forecasting
SAP R3 FI
Cost Planning and Measurement
Cost Estimating

defaultPosition.description: Creating web and database solutions for financial services through business analysis and program management.
defaultPosition.title: Management Information Analyst

positions.description: Creating web and database solutions for financial services through business analysis and program management.
positions.title: Management Information Analyst

positions.description: Managed 8 systems analysts/ developers/ testers in Brazil, Vietnam, India and U. S.  Implemented development process improvements, created standards for development activities, and generated cost estimates for major projects
positions.title: Advisory Software Engineer

positions.description:
Created customized solutions for pricing, inventory valuation and control, product costing, and product distribution in the semiconductor industry.  Developed new function through close collaboration with customers and programmers and refined the new function after initial deployment.  
Developed broad knowledge of SAP R/3 Sales and Distribution and Controlling modules and focused knowledge of Production Planning and Materials Management modules through multiple engagements that included five plants and two sales organizations.
positions.title: IT Specialist

positions.description: Forecasted manufacturing spending/cost for $1.1 billion worldwide semiconductor and packaging business.  Analyzed plant financial data and proposed opportunities to reduce cost.  Made recommendations on spending targets for the plants to senior management.
positions.title: Advisory Financial Analyst/Division Cost Coordinator

positions.description: Created annual cost plan for $300 million dollar enterprise, created cost standards for cost accounting, developed cost models, and ensured an accurate portrayal of product cost in business decisions.
positions.title: Advisory Financial Analyst/Site Cost Coordinator
